scripts.cypress:ci: NODE_ENV=test dotenv-flow -- cypress run --browser chrome --config video=true --spec 'cypress/e2e/unauthenticated/**/*' --record --group e2e
scripts.cypress:ci-auth: NODE_ENV=test dotenv-flow -- cypress run --browser chrome --config video=true --spec 'cypress/e2e/authenticated/**/*' --record --group e2e-auth
scripts.cypress:ci-mock: NODE_ENV=test dotenv-flow -- cypress run  --browser chrome --config video=true scrollBehavior=false --spec 'cypress/e2e/mock/**/*' --record --group e2e-mock
scripts.cypress:headless: NODE_ENV=test dotenv-flow -- cypress run --browser chrome --config video=false
scripts.start:e2e: LOG_LEVEL=debug npm run start:dev --prefix ./backend & npm run start --prefix ./frontend
scripts.start:mock: LOG_LEVEL=debug npm run mock-and-start --prefix ./backend & npm run start:mock  --prefix ./frontend
scripts.load-test: npm i --prefix ./load-tests && npm run build --prefix ./load-tests && NODE_ENV=development dotenv-flow -- k6 run ./load-tests/build/loadTest.bundle.js
